locations.heading: Discover Our Locations
locations.subheading: Explore the Aegean Region with our various locations

info_text.text: Ephesus Ancient City started as a simple settlement in 8600 BC and grew over the centuries to become one of the most important world capitals of its time.
The House of Virgin Mary is located on Mount Koressos, 9 km from Selçuk. It is known that St. John brought Virgin Mary to Ephesus 4 or 6 years after the death of Jesus.
Şirince, a mountain village in the Selçuk district of Izmir, is undoubtedly one of Turkey's most aesthetic villages.
Didim, affiliated with Aydın province, is one of Turkey's important tourism destinations. It is located 123 km away from Aydın city center.
Izmir; It is adjacent to the provinces of Manisa, Balıkesir, and Aydın. It is home to Turkey's largest 7th port.

Dilek Peninsula - Büyük Menderes Delta National Park is a national park located within the borders of Aydın province, at the southernmost point where Mount Dilek extends to the Aegean Sea. It covers an area of 27,675 hectares.
Bodrum is one of the 13 districts of Muğla. The district is known today as an important tourism center, which has its own unique characteristics that contribute to Bodrum's fame.
